tool_description: API for quotes from the Harry Potter books.
name: Harry Potter Quotes
title: Harry Potter Quotes

api_list.name: Get all quotes from person
api_list.description: Get all quotes said by person
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harry-potter-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes/harry potter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harry-potter-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://harry-potter-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes/{person}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harry-potter-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get A Random Quote
api_list.description: Get a random quote from all quotes

api_list.name: Get All Quotes
api_list.description: Get all the quotes with options to skip or limit the quotes
